lead_paragraph: When he's not chanting and living the austere life of a Buddhist priest, Kazuki Yazawa contemplates Olympic gold.

headline.print_headline: Japanese Buddhist Priest Contemplates Canoe Gold in Rio
headline.main: Japanese Buddhist Priest Contemplates Canoe Gold in Rio
